views.markdown:
*Works with the Latest TikTok Version 14.2.0*

For You:

✔︎ Download Videos
✔︎ Following Page enhancements
✔︎ Hide all buttons and text views for all videos (LP)
✔︎ Comment more than 90 characters for all videos
✔︎ Present the download button in For You page (LP)
✔︎ Pinch to zoom and rotation gestures for videos
✔︎ Perform all share actions

User:
✔︎ Download User's Profile Image
✔︎ Show date created for all videos
✔︎ View Private or Under Review videos
✔︎ Spoof Following, Fan and Hearts stats (LP)
✔︎ Display the region for all Users
✔︎ Display User's birthday, age and video upload count
✔︎ Sort user's videos by Likes in descending order
✔︎ Sort user's Liked videos in descending order

Other:
✔︎ LIVE enhancements (LP)
✔︎ View extra user info for all members in Live streams
✔︎ Type more than 50 characters in Live Chats
✔︎ Display all gift prizes in Live streams
✔︎ Disable marking profiles as seen
✔︎ Upload videos up to 600s length
✔︎ Removed TikTok Ads

*LP = Long Press for 1 second

Open sourced:

Updated for TikTok version 14.2.0 - Fixed Live streams
- Fixed spoofing stats
- Supports the latest TikTok v12.1.0
- Display Following Count for "Who Viewed Your Profile" page
- Auto scroll videos feature
2.2:
--------------------------------------------------------------
- Fixed crash when tapping your own profile
- Fixed issue where Draft videos prevented sorting
- View videos marked as "Friends Only"
- Fixed crash when tapping your own profile in LIVE Streams
- Download User's default image
- Added timestamp for LIVE streams
- Filter videos by double tapping anywhere in the Profile View
- Fixed issue where videos were paused due to Ads
- Works with the latest TikTok version
NOTE: Works with TikTok v10.0.0
- Complete redesign for Unicorn settings
- Upload videos up to 10 min. length
- Removed Ads
- Disable marking profiles as seen
- View extra user Info for all members in LIVE streams
- Pinch to zoom and rotation gestures for videos
- [x] View "private" or "under review" videos in LIKED feed
- [x] Comment more than 90 characters for all videos
- [x] Spoof user's "Following", "Fan" and "Hearts" numbers (long press each label for 1 second)
- [x] Show date created to each video in USER feed
- [x] Sort user's videos by "likes" in descending order
- [x] Present the download button when long pressing the "For You" page.
- [x] Perform all share actions
- Ad banners were obscuring the views and were not working properly, therefore, were removed.


***Now works with the latest TikTok version 9.9.6***

- Fixed issue where the download button was missing for the latest TikTok Version

- Updated the download button image and animation

- Fixed issue where images/videos weren't downloading properly.

- Fixed small bugs
